title: 9 Exceptional--And Plucky--Core Bond Funds
text:
Our Picks 9 Exceptional--And Plucky--Core Bond Funds These Gold-rated funds all hail from the new Intermediate Core-Plus Bond Morningstar Category. Jul 30, 2019

In early May, Morningstar retired the intermediate-term bond Morningstar Category, which was the largest of our fixed-income categories. In its place, we introduced two new categories: intermediate core bond and intermediate core-plus bond. Why the change?
